title: Stage Lv6-P7-S39
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I agree with you up to a point.
This is true in some respects, but not entirely.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I agree with you up to a point.

sentences.kr: 이것은 어떤 면에서는 사실이지만 완전히는 아닙니다.
sentences.en: This is true in some respects, but not entirely.
Your point is valid in certain aspects.

sentences.kr: 이 분석은 어느 정도 정확하지만 완전하지는 않습니다.
sentences.en: This analysis is somewhat accurate, but not complete.
I agree with this approach to a limited extent.

sentences.kr: 몇 가지 관점에서는 타당하지만 전체적으로는 의문입니다.
sentences.en: It makes sense from some perspectives, but I have reservations overall.

sentences.kr: 부분적으로는 옳지만 더 많은 고려가 필요합니다.
sentences.en: You're partially correct, but more consideration is needed.
